text: This plate is rated for NIJ III, which means it's been tested to survive at least 3 rounds of high-energy rifle rounds.
This plate is rated for NIJ III+, which means it's been tested to survive at least 3 rounds of high-energy rifle rounds, and a number of "special threat" rounds on top of that.
This plate is rated for NIJ IV, which means it's been tested to survive at least 3 rounds of armor-piercing high-energy rifle rounds: some of the most dangerous rounds out there.
